## ComponentPresentation.applyTo() method

Applies the presentation details to the specified element.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
applyTo(element: FASTElement): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | [FASTElement](./fast-element.fastelement.md) | The element to apply the presentation details to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
